title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Collaborative Design-Based Language Learning for Remote Education Satisfaction Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning and online learning tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design distance language learning programs using the five stages of the ADDIE model (analysis, design, development, implementation, evaluation)
Learners can suggest at least three strategies to overcome technical constraints encountered during remote education using smartphone-based tools
Learners can improve the effectiveness of their designed distance language learning programs to over 80% satisfaction through peer and self-evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
